name: subedit
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to check and make changes to a text, especially for a newspaper, in order to prepare it to be published: All the articles have been carefully subedited. He told me he used to sub-edit my reviews for The Sunday Times when he was deputy literary editor. He used to give us lessons in how to sub-edit and how to write. Synonym
sub (IN PUBLISHING)
More examplesFewer examplesPrior to the subedited transcript being forwarded for publication, each Member is given an opportunity to read it and, if necessary, to make minor corrections.I've always joked about how hard it would be to subedit a poem.Recently, I have sub-edited professional membership magazines.
